parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size of the responses.

parameters.name: buyerReference
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by the buyer reference.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by the given term. This will search product data, custom fields and more.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the response. Currently the only known format is `csv`.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by status or statuses.

parameters.name: transportMode
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by transport mode or modes.

parameters.name: plannedCargoReadyDateAfter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by cargo ready date (inclusive).

parameters.name: plannedCargoReadyDateBefore
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by cargo ready date (inclusive).

parameters.name: plannedDeliveryDateAfter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by delivery date (inclusive).

parameters.name: plannedDeliveryDateBefore
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by delivery date (inclusive).

parameters.name: confirmedCargoReadyDateAfter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by confirmed cargo ready date (inclusive).

parameters.name: confirmedCargoReadyDateBefore
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by confirmed cargo ready date (inclusive).

parameters.name: estimatedDeliveryDateAfter
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by estimated delivery date (start of the interval, inclusive).

parameters.name: estimatedDeliveryDateBefore
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by estimated delivery date (inclusive).

parameters.name: confirmationStatus
parameters.description: Filter purchase orders by confirmation status. By default all purchase orders are returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Only list purchase orders with the given ids.

schema.description: Purchase orders and items as a tab separated CSV. Will include a header column. Each row is one item of a purchase order. All purchase order properties are duplicated for each item. Returns the full data set, pagination is ignored.
